short_description: Splits LiDAR points up into a series of new files based on their properties.

parameters.name: Input LiDAR Points
parameters.description: Name of the input LiDAR points.

parameters.name: Split Criterion
parameters.description: Criterion on which to base the split of the input file. Options include 'num_pts, 'x', 'y', 'z', intensity, 'class', 'user_data', 'point_source_id', 'scan_angle', 'time'

parameters.name: Minimum Number of Points
parameters.description: Minimum number of points in an output file
